overview:
Daniel is a serial entrepreneur with 9 years of experience in the entrepreneurial education market.

He was founder of Club for Young Entrepreneurs in 2001 and managed to build a community with about 2,000 startup-members.

In 2009 he co-founded Dealmakerz an education tool and started to popularize convertible note in emerging markets like Hungary.

In November 2009 he co-founded Enterprising Culture LLC an R&D company working in the entrepreneurial education market which he left in January 2011 to focus on his new project: Network Future Inc.
